text: 30 states do not have explicit civil rights protections for LGBTQ Americans. The inconsistent patchwork of state laws leaves millions of people vulnerable to discrimination at work, at school, and in many other parts of their lives. That is why we must pass the #EqualityAct

html: Furthermore, Attorney General Jeff Sessions should reverse his so-called ‘tough on crime’ directive to prosecutors instructing them to levy the most serious charges, to include mandatory minimums, regardless of the circumstances of the case.
text: Furthermore, Attorney General Jeff Sessions should reverse his so-called ‘tough on crime’ directive to prosecutors instructing them to levy the most serious charges, to include mandatory minimums, regardless of the circumstances of the case.

html: I also urge @POTUS to do the same for the 2,600 other federal prisoners who are serving similar draconian sentences for nonviolent drug offenses. He should also support the #SAFEJusticeAct, which focuses mandatory minimum sentences on drug kingpins, instead of people like Alice.

html: The @HouseGOP talks a big game about supporting farmers, but this #GOPFarmBill hurts millions - from the pasture to the plate. With so many farmers already getting hit in the wallet by the Trump tariffs, this Harm Bill makes things worse. Rural America deserves #ABetterDeal.
text:
The @HouseGOP talks a big game about supporting farmers, but this #GOPFarmBill hurts millions - from the pasture to the plate. 

With so many farmers already getting hit in the wallet by the Trump tariffs, this Harm Bill makes things worse.

Rural America deserves #ABetterDeal.

html: 2 million people will have their access to food threatened if the @HouseGOP passes their hyper-partisan #FarmBill. That’s beyond unjust. We should strengthen and #ProtectSNAP — the most effective anti-hunger program in US history — not put Americans at risk of going hungry.
text:
2 million people will have their access to food threatened if the @HouseGOP passes their hyper-partisan #FarmBill.

That’s beyond unjust.

We should strengthen and #ProtectSNAP — the most effective anti-hunger program in US history — not put Americans at risk of going hungry.
